page.title: 17Getting Ready for School
page.content: Most of us rise between 0700 and 0800 We dress ready for school, and wash before breakfast, though some wait until afterwards to clean their teeth after eating. Those of us with pets feed them and make sure that they are all right. Some of us help Mum in getting breakfast ready. Cereal, toast and a drink is the normal breakfast, though one or two have bacon and egg. We nearly all have fruit juice as well as a hot drink, mostly tea. After breakfast we while away the time until we need to go to school by watching television. Those of us who take packed lunches to school usually prepare it ourselves. When Mum is ready she will drive us to school, though some of us travel in a Mini-bus, to arrive by 0900. A few of us who live nearby walk to school.
